text: Hi <@U05NK2J2ATU> - as per our code of conduct, self promotion is not permitted in this Slack, with the exception of the <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> and <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> - but you canâ€™t just post a LinkedIn post without any context.
